titles.title: Four Corners Television Access Act of 2009
A bill to provide certain counties with the ability to receive television broadcast signals of their choice.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: 4/1/2009--Introduced. Four Corners Television Access Act of 2009 - Amends federal copyright law and the Communications Act of 1934 to allow satellite or cable retransmission of signals of broadcast television stations located in the capital of a state to counties in that state if the counties meet specified criteria.
